body.title: ABOUT ME
body.description: Senior Full Stack developer who values performant, reliable and long lasting solutions with a passion for web applications and design.

description: Technical advisor and senior developer for City of Melbourne CityDNA exhibition, along side multiple standalone applications
Designing and developing City of Melbourne map based digital products, this includes being responsible for technical solutions and infrastructure
Critical role in shaping digital user experiences, providing expertise on designing simple and accessible web applications
Maintainer of core City of Melbourne NPM packages, including a reusable UI component library and a core Map based functionality
Other work includes assisting other teams with AWS and developing key applications such as Aboriginal Melbourne Desktop

Contribution in designing, developing and providing resources and tooling for NABs micro-frontend solution. Including documentation creation and improvement, running internal training sessions on micro-front ends and general web based solutions
Improve developer tooling that is used across the organisation, done through constant upgrades and improvements to application generator (React and GraphQL based project)

Maintaining NABs web based React component library, overseeing every PR and enforcing strict standards across contributions. This library is used in large number of applications across the organisation.
Range of DevOps tasks including creating and maintaining Dockerfiles, automate AWS ECS deployments, Jenkins maintenance as well as pipeline creation and Akamai management
Ongoing improvements to AEM components such as automatic file size display when authors create download links
Developed accessibility skip links functionality which enables quick navigation for keyboard users
Created a web-scraping tool using Pupeteer that audits nab.com.au to ensure consistent links are used across the site
